Text:
I think I'll be dropping me TPB account.
Yesterday i downloaded a fake mp3 album with missing tracks from a colored skull user (albim was 128 re-encoded to 320) I've downloaded a WinRar virus that i found in Sandra before and i have found countless non working or just plane braindead stupid torrents from colored users.. mever mind the fact that many of them are credit whores and strip and credit and added their own name, like one idiot i seen registered a month ago who deleted the group name and put his own in 13 times LOL
Fuck TPB and this god damn NOOBish idiot factory. I'm done.. i've seen and put up with far too much retarded bullshit around here, this place sucks fucking ass lol
